p: The trial was conducted at the experimental research station of the University of Trás-os-Montes e Alto Douro (UTAD, Portugal). Experiments were directed by trained scientists (following category C FELASA recommendations) and in compliance with the European (Directive 2010/63/EU) and Portuguese (Decreto-Lei n 113/2013, de 7 de Agosto) legislation on the protection of animals for scientific purposes. UTAD facilities and their staff are certified to house and conduct experiments with live animals (‘group-1’ license by the ‘Direção Geral de Veterinária’, Ministry of Agriculture, Rural Development and Fisheries of Portugal).
